channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP-Optimize
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP-Optimize

item.title: CVE-2023-1119|2023-08-14T13:36:14.436Z -- unknown -- wp-optimize
item.description: The WP-Optimize WordPress plugin before 3.2.13, SrbTransLatin WordPress plugin before 2.4.1 use a third-party library that removes the escaping on some HTML characters, leading to a cross-site scripting vulnerability.
